Class Utils

java.lang.Object
com.calcgame.main.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
A utility class that should never be instantiated. All methods are static.

  • Method Details

    • writerFromLogger

      public static Writer writerFromLogger(org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger)
      Creates a new Writer object that writes everything using the provided logger
      Parameters:
      logger - the logger to use
      Returns:
      a new Writer object that is configured to write everything using Logger.info(Object)

    • pyDefinesFunction

      public static boolean pyDefinesFunction(String script, String func_name)
      Returns whether the provided Python script defines a function with the specified name
      Parameters:
      script - the Python script
      func_name - the name of the function to look for
      Returns:
      whether the provided Python script defines a function with the specified name

    • funcFromPy

      public static <T> Consumer<T> funcFromPy(org.python.util.PythonInterpreter py, String script, String func_name, org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger out)
      Generates a function from the specified python script and function name.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the function's first and only argument
      Parameters:
      py - the PythonInterpreter to use
      script - the Python script, from which to get the function
      func_name - the name of the function
      out - the logger, to which the function will output
      Returns:
      a java function, that is equivalent to the specified function in python, or null if the provided script does not define it

    • actionFromPy

      public static Action actionFromPy(org.python.util.PythonInterpreter py, String script, String name, org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger out, Consumer<ActionContext> fallback_redo, Consumer<ActionContext> fallback_undo)
      Generates an action object from the specified python script and name.
      Parameters:
      py - the python interpreter to use
      script - the python script from which to get the functions
      name - the name of the function for redo
      out - the logger to use for the python functions to output
      fallback_redo - the redo function to use if the python function was not defined
      fallback_undo - the undo function to use if the python function was not defined
      Returns:
      an action object, that has a python function with the name name as Action.redo(), and a function with name name + "_rev" as Action.undoInternal()

    • actionFromPy

      public static Action actionFromPy(org.python.util.PythonInterpreter py, String script, String name, org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger out)
      Generates an action object from the specified python script and name. Equivalent to using actionFromPy(PythonInterpreter, String, String, Logger, Consumer, Consumer) with the last two arguments as null
      Parameters:
      py - the python interpreter to use
      script - the python script from which to get the functions
      name - the name of the function for redo
      out - the logger to use for the python functions to output
      Returns:
      an action object, that has a python function with the name name as Action.redo(), and a function with name name + "_rev" as Action.undoInternal()

    • toJSON

      Serialises a PyComplex number
      Parameters:
      x - the object to serialize
      Returns:
      the serialised object

      public static org.python.core.PyComplex fromJSON(org.json.JSONObject o)
      Deserializes a PyComplex number
      Parameters:
      o - the object to deserialize into a PyComplex number
      Returns:
      the deserialized object
